useCase.name: Search Content
useCase.description: User searches for content using speech input

preconditions.precondition: User has access to the device with speech recognition capabilities

successEndConditions.condition: Search results are displayed to the user

useCase.trigger: User speaks into the device to initiate the search

mainSequence.step: UI Interface captures the audio input
Speech Recognition Module processes and converts speech to text
Speech Recognition Module sends the converted text to Content Query Processor
Content Query Processor queries the Content Database for matching content items
Content Query Processor displays search results to the UI Interface
UI Interface shows search results to the user
